headline: Orchestra BioMed to Host Business Update Call on November 12, 2025
summary: NEW HOPE, Pa., Nov. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Orchestra BioMed Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: OBIO) (“Orchestra BioMed” or the “Company”), a biomedical company accelerating high-impact technologies to patients through strategic partnerships with market-leading global medical device companies, today announced that company management will host a business update call on Wednesday, November 12th at 8:00 AM ET. headline: United States Neurology Devices Market Research 2025-2033: Rising Neurological Disorder Prevalence, Advancements in Treatment Technologies, and Government R&D Support Spur Expansion
summary: The US neurology devices market is driven by rising neurological disorders and tech advancements, supported by government R&D funding. Key segments include neurostimulation and neurosurgery devices, with major players like Medtronic and Boston Scientific. Opportunities lie in innovation and strategic collaborations.
